remarks: ` G ` is a function.  Lemma for ~ tz7.44-1 , ~ tz7.44-2 , and ~ tz7.44-3 .  (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-1995.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
statement:
tz7.44lem1.1 $e |- G = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x = (/) /\ y = A ) \/ ( -. ( x = (/) \/ Lim dom x ) /\ y = ( H ` ( x ` U. dom x ) ) ) \/ ( Lim dom x /\ y = U. ran x ) ) } $.
tz7.44lem1 $p |- Fun G $.
